website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate in power for cleaning your computer. Just be careful because in some ways it can be too powerful.
pros: Includes 3 large attachments and a 4-piece micro-cleaning-tool kit
cons: Can easily be damaged if dropped and needs to be held onto when you turn it on so it doesn't blow away
Several buyers said the outer steel case heats up quickly

customer_reviews.title: Versatile cleaning tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning delicate and small areas, such as appliance filters, computers (of course) and other narrow tight locations. Nice range of attachment tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attachment variety make this a good deal for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the power I was hoping for in vacuuming or blowing but the attachments make it very easy to get in to tight spaces such as between fan blades to the dust on the heatsink and to carefully/gently clean around smaller sensitive chips and components. At the price paid definitely happy with performance.
customer_reviews.author: HelenWheels

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This thing could suck the data off my SSD lol Great for cleaning keyboards & inside towers.

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is very high and the airflow from such a small package is amazing. The best feature is that it can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Beyond what I expected. Build quality is very high and the airflow from such a small package is amazing. The best feature is that it can be used as both a blower and vacuum. Attachments are comprehensive and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: A great tool. My wife not only uses it on ...
customer_reviews.text: A great tool. My wife not only uses it on her computer, but also to clean her sewing machines. An added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lovitt

customer_reviews.title: ...better than blowing dust around!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Metro DataVac to clean dust out of a desktop machine that had been running for years without proper maintenance. Easily vacuumed a quarter to a half-inch of dust off of fan screens and heatsinks. Remember to tie down fan blades before vacuuming to prevent spinning them too fast and damaging the bearings! As others have reported the unit can run quite hot after prolonged use. Also, I had to add a rubber O-ring where the hose connects at the front because it kept falling off...there just wasn't enough pressure to keep it tight, the slightest twist would uncouple the hose from the tank. Still better than blowing dust around!
customer_reviews.author: Peculiar Animal

customer_reviews.title: Not for toner clean up
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a five for the size of the unit and I didn't do my homework before ordering this unit. Do not use this for toner clean up as the particles are very small and will blow out the back and sides. Check the Metrovac website first for the proper unit and toner bags
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful tool for computer and server dusting.
customer_reviews.text: This thing for such a small unit can really push/ pull air. I normally go through about 3 cans of air when I clean my network. This thing will pay for itself in the first year. I highly recommend this for anyone with computers, platform consoles, or servers in a really dusty environment. I added a tube sock to the exhaust/ blow end when vacuuming just to add another layer of particulate capture. It really doesn't need it, but my wife was concerned that it would just through dust around the house. The filter seem to do a really good job though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. It’s the best ever. I am an engineer and work on delicate systems always. This is awesome for the money. Used the 3m for many years and they are awesome but so darn expensive. This does it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mmf

customer_reviews.title: if you can keep it from falling apart...
customer_reviews.text: anytime its even lightly bumped the ends fall off. suction is so so but the hose is way to short. considering anytime the unit moves it falls apart, really hard to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Use it for computer repair
customer_reviews.text: The vaccuum side of this falls off very easily. Not really an issue for me and nothing that some duck tape couldn't take care of. Its loud and heats up after a bit of use, but none of that is a problem unless you just have it on constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: We use this at a bank and it’s working out great. Good quality and really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for the computer systems and Bingo machines at our VFW.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Wright

customer_reviews.title: It's So Loud!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few years and cost vs. trouble vs. performance, I wouldn't buy it again. It's so loud and cumbersome to work with that I dread the thought of using it when it's time to clean my computers. It get's pretty hot and is loud. I can get equally good if not better results w/a can of air and a Dust Buster. Did I mention that it was loud?
customer_reviews.author: Hook'nBull

product_meta.title: Includes 5 Bonus Bags! Metro DataVac Pro Series Model MDV-1BA Computer Vac - Blower - Made in The USA
feature_bullets: Bonus- Includes an additional package of 5 disposable bags for your MDV-1BA - Total of 10 bags! Comes With DataVac 5 year motor warranty.
The DataVac Pro Series is the leading computer cleaning system in the world, and is able to pick up even the tiniest particles of dust, dirt, hair, debris, paper shreds and so much more.
Each DataVac Pro Series features a high-powered, 120 volt/4.5 amps motor that has both vacuum and blower options.
Don’t be fooled by the DataVac Pro Series’ durable, all-steel construction—at only three pounds, this multipurpose unit is incredibly lightweight!
Each DataVac Pro Series by MetroVac features a 19-inch flexible hose, crevice tool, air pin pointer, soft-bristle brush, four-piece micro cleaning tool kit and five disposable paper bags.
